words.def: The act or process in which things are tidied.
the quality of being worthy of esteem or respect
news; new information.
the time when something ends
thickly covered with ingrained dirt or soot
the act of tying or binding things together
one of the elements that collectively form a system of numeration
bright with a steady but subdued shining
receptacle that holds odds and ends (as sewing materials)
very small
a ringing sound
interchangeable with `means' in the expression `by means of'
a central point or locus of an infection in an organism
a light clear metallic sound as of a small bell
The currency of Peru between 1985 and 1991, replacing the sol.
(ethnic slur) offensive term for a Jew
the dark negative feminine principle in Chinese dualistic cosmology
the site of an archeological exploration
A disease of sheep caused by tapeworm.
strong liquor flavored with juniper berries
a loud harsh or strident noise
a person who is deemed to be despicable or contemptible
the shorter of the two telegraphic signals used in Morse code
a silvery malleable metallic element that resists corrosion
a luminance unit equal to 1 candle per square meter measured perpendicular to the rays from the source
County/City (Proper noun)
a state in the Rocky Mountains
a unit of length equal to one twelfth of a foot
a light strong grey lustrous corrosion-resistant metallic element used in strong lightweight alloys (as for airplane parts)
the branch of engineering that deals with the use of computers and telecommunications to retrieve and store and transmit information
